subject: Hockey, Ice
Playoff Games
lead_paragraph: With a match against the Capitals looming and little time for the Rangers to celebrate their Game 7 victory, Brian Boyle practiced but said he had “no idea” whether he’d be able to play.
snippet: With a match against the Capitals looming and little time for the Rangers to celebrate their Game 7 victory, Brian Boyle practiced but said he had “no idea” whether he’d be able to play.
